title: Unifying some classical results on Artinian rings and modules
authors: Donovan Leyba, Zachary Mesyan, and Greg Oman
abstract:
In this note, we introduce a very crude but natural notion of measure on the
class of left R-modules over a ring R. We use this notion to give short proofs
of some classical theorems on (left) Artinian rings and modules, due to
Akizuki, Anderson, Hopkins, and Levitzki, as well as of some new results.
